page.topic: Getting the Name of the Currently Running Script or Function
page.description: The following script illustrates how to get the name of the currently running script or function.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim module as P dim exe as P dim name as C module = type::xbasicmodule.get_current() exe = module.executable() name = exe.name() ui_msg_box("Name of Current Script or Function",name)
